from notebookutils import mssparkutils
import sys

timeout_in_seconds = 60 * 30

# List of notebooks to run
notebooks = [
    'saphr/py_load_sap_hr',
    'saphr/py_hist_sap_hr',
    # Add more notebooks as needed
]

# Run all notebooks with error handling
for notebook in notebooks:
    try:
        print(f"Starting execution of notebook: {notebook}")
        mssparkutils.notebook.run(notebook, timeout_in_seconds)
        print(f"Successfully completed notebook: {notebook}")
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"Error executing notebook {notebook}: {str(e)}")
        # Uncomment the next line if you want to stop on first error
        # sys.exit(1)
